Breakdown/Hiss/Pyro:

::Breakdown nodded as Quickstrike spoke, then looked to Hiss as he saw 
Quickstrike talk to Shredder, though he couldn't hear the words at all::
"Be on your guard, if he tries anything, get his leg." (he whisperes so only 
Hiss and Pyro hear him)
"This message was purely words.  You can't really describe someone based on 
words.  Though...I'll try.  He seemed to be rather intelligent.  Doesn't 
waste time.  And seemed to care about your safety quite a lot.  That is about 
all I can gather form the single message I heard of his."
